video.title: Eureka
video.synopsis: When he becomes sheriff of a small town, an ex-U.S. marshal discovers that the citizens are scientists working for a top-secret research facility.

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious kaleidoscopic wave of color crashes over Eureka, leaving the entire town and its inhabitants animated.
episodes.title: Do You See What I See?

episodes.synopsis: After the Astraeus mission's launch to Titan, the crew manages to land the ship safely and find out they are back on Earth! What seemed like only a few hours was in fact a few years and the crewmembers have to re-adjust.
episodes.title: Lost

episodes.synopsis: Carter, Henry, Kevin and the rest of the town continue to search for the missing Astraeus crew. Kevin's strangelet detector discovers the ship's trail! But where they are and who has been hiding them will be a shock to everyone.
episodes.title: The Real Thing

episodes.synopsis: The ship is finally found but the crew has been taken. When Carter is tasked with attempting to rescue the kidnapped crew by following them into the virtual Eureka, will he be able to get them out before their matrix world collapses for good?
episodes.title: Force Quit

episodes.synopsis: With life back to normal, the Astraeus crew struggles to overcome their Matrix Eureka experience: what was real, what wasn't and what could become self-fulfilling prophecy.
episodes.title: Friendly Fire

episodes.synopsis: The Astraeus crew must move forward after their matrix ordeal, but it isn't easy. And a return visit from DOD psychological assessor Warren Hughes just adds to the pressure.
episodes.title: Jack of All Trades

episodes.synopsis: To better protect against potential security breaches, Henry implements a disaster preparedness drill for Global Dynamics. But the real-life simulation proves a little too disastrous.
episodes.title: Worst Case Scenario

episodes.synopsis: Fargo and Zane secretly work to retrieve Holly's "consciousness" from the Matrix Eureka computer mainframe.
episodes.title: Ex Machina

episodes.synopsis: Allison and Carter's engagement hits rough waters when Carter's attempt at romance traps them at the bottom of Lake Archimedes in a leaking sub.
episodes.title: In Too Deep

episodes.synopsis: When Allison's genius older brother comes to meet her new husband, Carter feels the pressure of not being smart enough to measure up.
episodes.title: Smarter Carter

episodes.synopsis: Carter's best-laid plans to give Allison a romantic honeymoon are thrown for a loop when their definitions of "romantic" differ greatly.
episodes.title: The Honeymooners

episodes.synopsis: When Grace's spying is revealed, mistrust is in the air. Maj. Shaw shows up to take control of the situation.
episodes.title: Mirror, Mirror

episodes.synopsis: The Smart Dust control unit is still on the fritz and wreaking havoc on the town's communications systems.
episodes.title: Double-Take

episodes.synopsis: The DOD is pulling the plug on Eureka.
episodes.title: Just Another Day
